last_episode_to_air.name: Hambo 1: Galactic Super Swine of the Wild West
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dirk gives up stunting, and becomes a cooker, meanwhile Piggy becomes a movie actor.

name: Almost Naked Animals
overview: Underwear-clad animals led by Howie the canine  run the beachfront hotel Banana Cabana, leading to mayhem, destruction  and tons of all-around fun.

episodes.name: It's My Party
episodes.overview: With a party going on at the hotel, the staff gets locked in the basement.

episodes.name: One Star Hotel
episodes.overview: Howie will lose his hotel unless it gets at least one star from a critic.

episodes.name: There Are No Small Parts
episodes.overview: Howie waits in an endless line to audition for a new action movie.

episodes.name: Keep On Monster Truckin'
episodes.overview: Howie finds a toy truck that grows when water is added.

episodes.name: Ear Wax Elf
episodes.overview: Howie puts a blob of wax under his pillow for the Earwax Elf, but she fails to show up.

episodes.name: Stunter's Block
episodes.overview: Howie attempts to entice his idol out of retirement.

episodes.name: What Would Batty Do?
episodes.overview: Howie takes over for an injured Batty, who teaches Bunny how to run the hotel.

episodes.name: The Duck Vinci Code
episodes.overview: A bolt of lightning gives Duck the ability to see into the future.

episodes.name: Employee of the Month for Life
episodes.overview: To help determine who should be the employee of the month, Howie does everyone's jobs.

episodes.name: Saliva Drive
episodes.overview: Everybody collects saliva for Octo, whose mouth has dried up.

episodes.name: Veggie Beast
episodes.overview: Howie grows a plant that unintentionally eats his pals.

episodes.name: Hurricane Seasoning
episodes.overview: Howie's friends get trapped outdoors during a condiment storm.

episodes.name: Act to the Future
episodes.overview: To avoid being in Bunny's play, Howie and Octo attempt to travel to the  future.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Lunch
episodes.overview: Piggy prepares for his final ninjitsu-chef test.

episodes.name: All Dog, No Danger
episodes.overview: Howie gets kicked out of the Dirk Danger fan club.

episodes.name: Cowboy Cabana
episodes.overview: The Banana Cabana  is visited by two gassy bulls who just want to trash the place.

episodes.name: Oh Brother, Who Art Thou?
episodes.overview: Howie's 'long-lost brother' shows up to claim his half of the hotel.

episodes.name: Nothing But the Tooth
episodes.overview: Bunny unintentionally offers the hotel as the prize in a scavenger hunt.

episodes.name: Fizz Fuzz Bang
episodes.overview: When Poodle attacks the Banana Cabana with Cap'n Fizzy's ship, it's up to Howie to stop her.

episodes.name: A Fish This Big
episodes.overview: Howie is treated like a hero for saving a  squirrel.

episodes.name: Better Safe and Sorry
episodes.overview: Safety monitor Octo tries to make the Banana Cabana overly safe.

episodes.name: Narwhal's Contest
episodes.overview: When Narwhal's biggest fan wins a contest to spend a day with him, he ignores her.

episodes.name: Cool Paw Howie
episodes.overview: Howie converts the hotel into a minimum-security prison.

episodes.name: S.S. Banana Cabana
episodes.overview: After a toilet mishap, the Banana Cabana ends up floating on the high seas!

episodes.name: Robo-Howie
episodes.overview: Poodle builds a robot Howie to take over the Banana Cabana.

episodes.name: The Old Act
episodes.overview: Narwhal's obnoxious former partner shows up and wants to put the old act back together.

episodes.name: Jellyhead
episodes.overview: A jellyfish latches onto Octo and starts to take over his personality.

episodes.name: Matter Over Mind
episodes.overview: Howie gets the remote control stuck to his head and develops strange powers.

episodes.name: The Sun Howie Always Wanted
episodes.overview: After several days of bad weather, Duck creates an artificial sun that never sets.

episodes.name: In The Deep End
episodes.overview: Narwhal is forced to confess that he never learned to swim.

episodes.name: Gone Banana
episodes.overview: When the hotel's rooftop banana vanishes, Howie and Octo set out to find it.

episodes.name: Imaginary Fiend
episodes.overview: Howie's imaginary friend comes to visit and drives everyone crazy.

episodes.name: Who Inked the Bed?
episodes.overview: Octo's scary dreams have him staining his sheets in the shapes of the Cabana crew.

episodes.name: Kikmee
episodes.overview: Howie challenges Bunny to get through a day without being angry.

episodes.name: Candid Camaraderie
episodes.overview: Poodle tries to humiliate the Banana Cabana staff.

episodes.name: May the Best Loser Win
episodes.overview: Octo is the only  one unable to set a record in Cap'n Fizzy's Book of Unnecessary Accomplishments.

episodes.name: Piggy Party
episodes.overview: Howie and the gang try to throw a surprise party for a suspicious Piggy.

episodes.name: Living Dangerously
episodes.overview: Howie becomes a product tester for Dirk Danger's hazardous merchandise.

episodes.name: The Orange Fizzy Blues
episodes.overview: Howie must collect all the puzzle pieces to win a limited-edition can of  Cap'n Fizzy's Fuzzy Orange Soda.

episodes.name: Champion Gurgitator
episodes.overview: Howie enters an eating contest.

episodes.name: Piggy's Secret
episodes.overview: Howie and Octo try to find out why Piggy is acting mysteriously.

episodes.name: Sloth Unleashed
episodes.overview: Howie tries to train Sloth to be a stunter so she can join Dirk Danger's fan club.

episodes.name: Stink Dog
episodes.overview: When Howie stops bathing, his friends attempt a 'stinkervention.'

episodes.name: Doll Pox
episodes.overview: Howie tries to get the chicken pox so he can join the gang in  quarantine.

episodes.name: Cat's Eight Lives
episodes.overview: Cat trades eight of his nine lives for Howie's television -- but soon needs them back.

episodes.name: Crouching Narwhal, Hidden Piggy
episodes.overview: Narwhal competes against Piggy on a ninjitsu-chef  game show.

episodes.name: Howiewe'en
episodes.overview: Octo tries to embrace the scariest night of the year, Howiewe'en.

episodes.name: Hotel Of Horrors
episodes.overview: Howie uses the haunted bathroom in the basement and is sucked into a freaky world.

episodes.name: The Perfect Gift
episodes.overview: Narwhal wraps himself up as the perfect gift for Bunny -- and ends up in  the furnace.

episodes.name: Home for the Howiedays
episodes.overview: Poodle reluctantly spends the Howiedays at the Banana  Cabana.

episodes.name: The Cabana Manana
episodes.overview: Howie and the gang try to convince Yeti their hotel is too weird for  him.

episodes.name: Howie's Little Helper
episodes.overview: A chipmunk goes power mad when Howie lets him manage the hotel  for a day.

episodes.name: Horn Swoggled
episodes.overview: When Narwhal loses his horn, the source of his musical mojo, he switches jobs with Duck.

episodes.name: The Night Shift
episodes.overview: Howie discovers there’s a night shift at the Banana Cabana, and has a lot more fun. Meanwhile, everyone starts to wonder why Howie is always tired.

episodes.name: Trash to the Past
episodes.overview: When garbage starts falling out of thin air, Howie and the gang try to figure out why and realize that Duck created time travel.

episodes.name: The Green Banana
episodes.overview: Howie attempts to ‘go green’ and goes too far and turns the hotel into an eco-friendly place. Meanwhile Duck tries to fix the hole in the Ozone Layer.

episodes.name: Dr. Howie and Dr. Howyena
episodes.overview: Howie creates a potion that turns him into an obnoxious party animal, causing chaos at a class where possums try to stop playing dead.

episodes.name: Howie's Pet Project
episodes.overview: Bunny challenges Howie to look after a pineapple to test that he is responsible.

episodes.name: Octo vs. Batty
episodes.overview: Batty stays at the Banana Cabana while his cousin Ratty stays at Poodle's place. But Octo doesn't like how Batty's doing 'evil stuff'.

episodes.name: Needle Day
episodes.overview: Howie wants to give a nervous Narwhal a needle.

episodes.name: The Brother and Sister Games
episodes.overview: Howie sells coupons of the Banana Cabana. However, Poodle doesn't like how it's stealing her guests.

episodes.name: Feebie Jeebies
episodes.overview: Howie sells coupons of the Banana Cabana. However, Poodle doesn't like how it's stealing her guests.

episodes.name: Howie's Staycation
episodes.overview: Howie decides to take a "staycation" at the Banana Cabana by dressing up as a moose. But soon he meets a real moose, wanting revenge on Howie.

episodes.name: A Helping Paw
episodes.overview: Duck becomes Sloth's personal assistant when she only wanted to hang out with Howie.

episodes.name: Octopi P.I.
episodes.overview: Octo discovers a real mystery while writing his novel.

episodes.name: The Lost Stunt
episodes.overview: Howie tries to prove he's Dirk Danger's No. 1 fan.

episodes.name: Trance Romance
episodes.overview: Sloth hypnotizes Howie which makes him romantical but later Sloth misses the real Howie.

episodes.name: Wooing Warty
episodes.overview: Howie helps Piggy woo a warthog.

episodes.name: Octo Gets Tough
episodes.overview: Octo becomes a bit to fearless

episodes.name: Narwhal's Birthday
episodes.overview: Howie discovers Narwhal and Octo are related.

episodes.name: All Night Long
episodes.overview: Howie and Octo stay up all night to win Dirk Dangers latest video game.

episodes.name: Camp Stinka-wah-way
episodes.overview: Howie treats the gang to a weekend getaway at Radiation Roosters haunted campsite.

episodes.name: Ducking Duck
episodes.overview: Howie finds out that duck is royalty.

episodes.name: Banana Split
episodes.overview: A failed stunt splits the cabana in half.

episodes.name: Cap'n Fizzy Fizzles
episodes.overview: Howie tries to help Captain Fizzy stay in business.

episodes.name: Banned!
episodes.overview: Mayor Trout gets annoyed with Howie and his stunts so he gets banned.

episodes.name: Bumbag Bummer
episodes.overview: Sloth becomes famous for her bumbag.

episodes.name: Dirk Dubious
episodes.overview: Howie and Octo fear that Dirk Danger has been replaced.

episodes.name: Miss Surrounding Area
episodes.overview: Batty dresses up as a girl and competes against Bunny in a beauty contest.

episodes.name: Campaign Pains
episodes.overview: Howie runs for mayor, unaware of how much work comes with the job.

episodes.name: The Rotation Situation
episodes.overview: The Rotation Situation - Duck speeds up the Earth's rotation, causing them to age faster.

episodes.name: The Tail of Howie
episodes.overview: Howie sets out to re-accomplish everything he has ever accomplished - in just one afternoon.

episodes.name: The Big Burp Theory
episodes.overview: Howie must stop burping when royalty comes.

episodes.name: Who's Howie?
episodes.overview: Howie gets amnesia to everyone must help him regain his memory.

episodes.name: Inane In The Brain
episodes.overview: Using Duck's invention, Octo and Bunny travel inside Howie's brain to retrieve a password.

episodes.name: Laugh Piggy Laugh
episodes.overview: Piggy loses his laugh in an accident so Howie tries does more and more crazy things to make Piggy laugh.

episodes.name: Picture Day
episodes.overview: Howie wants the Cabana to take a perfect picture.

episodes.name: Part Timer
episodes.overview: Howie decides to get a part time job.

episodes.name: Howie's Allergy
episodes.overview: Howie's Allergy - Howie must give up sugar in order to stay healthy.

episodes.name: Figure Fight
episodes.overview: Howie and Octo fight over a rare Dirk Danger doll.

episodes.name: Mini Howies
episodes.overview: Duck creates a bunch of mini Howies, but they eventually cause chaos.

episodes.name: Dear Dirk
episodes.overview: Howie answers all of Dirk Danger's fan mail.

episodes.name: These Sleeps Were Made for Walkin'
episodes.overview: Howie enters Octo in a sleepwalking competition to win a bed that will help him stop sleepwalking.

episodes.name: The Best Friends Synchronized Dance, Ice Sculpting, Costume & Explosions Competition
episodes.overview: Howie and Octo put their friendship to the test, when a fortune cookie tells the that aren't.

episodes.name: Don't Follow the Leader
episodes.overview: Octo and Howie try to win a role-playing game.

episodes.name: The Snow-Tel
episodes.overview: The Banana Cabana gets covered by snow.

episodes.name: Luck Be a Robot
episodes.overview: Bunny becomes Howie's good luck charm.

episodes.name: Family Business
episodes.overview: Howie and Poodle have to run a successful business for a day or their dad will shut down both their hotels.

episodes.name: No Howies Allowed
episodes.overview: Octo, Piggy, and Narwhal stop Howie from invading Bunny's sleepover, so they'll get her Candy Con tickets.

episodes.name: Howie Day
episodes.overview: Howie wants his own day, when another Howie gets his own.

episodes.name: Sun Scream
episodes.overview: Duck creates his own sunscreen that creates disaster when used.

episodes.name: It's Duck's Party
episodes.overview: Narwhal is in charge of making sure no one interrupts Duck's exclusive party.

episodes.name: Father's Day
episodes.overview: Duck finds an egg, and becomes very over-protective.

episodes.name: Hambo 1: Galactic Super Swine of the Wild West
episodes.overview: Dirk gives up stunting, and becomes a cooker, meanwhile Piggy becomes a movie actor.
